sn46.7:1.1: “Mendicants, the rafters of a bungalow all slant, slope, and incline to the peak.
sn46.7:1.2: In the same way, a mendicant who develops and cultivates the seven awakening factors slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
sn46.7:2.1: And how does a mendicant who develops the seven awakening factors slant, slope, and incline to extinguishment?
sn46.7:2.2: It’s when a mendicant develops the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion,
sn46.7:2.3: and equanimity, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
sn46.7:2.4: That’s how a mendicant who develops and cultivates the seven awakening factors slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.”
